item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013120402
item.description:
What's changed:

  • currency conversion - you can now see the amount in your chosen fiat currency in the send dialog and on the balance page
  • fixed issue with incorrect decimal symbol when entering sent amount
  • transaction fee is now displayed in the send window (and the fee is added to instead of subtracted from the amount)
  • added Japanese and Serbian (Cyrillic and Latin) translations
  • UI updates in Sean's Outpost app
  • improved error handling during startup

item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013112501
item.description:
Warning: it's recommended to back up your Hive data directory (~/Library/Application Support/Hive) before installing this version.

What's changed:

  • added Finnish, Greek, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian and Turkish translations
  • switched to a more robust SQLite format for the database file instead of the old XML one
  • the balance field on the profile page will now show pending balance if some of the funds are blocked
  • error handling improvements - more errors should be caught, and you have an option of submitting error reports to us (uses HockeyApp API)
  • fixed issues with disappearing transactions (missing transactions should be restored now)
  • fixed a problem with BTC amount precision

item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013110501
item.description:
What's changed:

  • added Arabic, Chinese Simplified, Czech, Hindi, Korean, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog and Urdu translations
  • added LocalBitcoins and Patten applications
  • Hive can now handle bitcoin: links on websites
  • improved error handling - popup window should now show up if an error occurs while processing blockchain data
  • fixed JS API breaking after app page is reloaded

item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013102201
item.description:
What's changed:

  • Hive is now translated to Danish, Dutch, French, German, Italian and Polish (more languages coming soon!)
  • updated JavaScript API for apps

item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013101401
item.description:

item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013100401
item.description:
Note: if you're running an older build, you might get an "improperly signed" error - in this case you'll need to download the new version manually from the site. Sorry about that :\

What's changed:

  • you can now edit your profile (name, email)
  • address validation and better error handling in the send window
  • if the contacts or transactions list is empty, a nice view will be displayed explaining what that list is for
  • new transactions should always be added at the top of the list
  • fixed moving between contact form fields with the Tab key
